title: Spring Framework
detail: Spring provides everything required beyond the Java programming language for creating enterprise applications for a wide range of scenarios and architectures.

title: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)
detail: Object-oriented programming (OOP) is a computer programming model that organizes software design around data, or objects, rather than functions and logic. An object can be defined as a data field that has unique attributes and behavior.

title: Software Architecture
detail: Software architecture is, simply, the organization of a system. This organization includes all components, how they interact with each other, the environment in which they operate, and the principles used to design the software.

title: Web Development
detail: Web development is the work involved in developing a website for the Internet or an intranet.
